controls.title: Identity and Access Management Policy and Procedures
controls.description: Establish comprehensive identity and access management policies for OpenSearch cluster access

implementation.description: Define IAM policies and roles with least privilege access, implement fine-grained access control using OpenSearch security plugin

controls.title: Data Security and Information Lifecycle Management
controls.description: Implement encryption at rest and in transit for all OpenSearch data

implementation.description: Enable encryption at rest using AWS KMS keys and enforce HTTPS/TLS for all communications

controls.title: Infrastructure and Virtualization Security
controls.description: Secure network infrastructure and implement network segmentation

implementation.description: Deploy OpenSearch in VPC with private subnets, configure security groups with minimal required ports

controls.title: Logging and Monitoring
controls.description: Enable comprehensive logging and monitoring for security events

implementation.description: Enable CloudWatch logs, CloudTrail, and OpenSearch audit logs with appropriate retention policies

controls.title: Business Continuity Management
controls.description: Implement backup and disaster recovery procedures

implementation.description: Configure automated snapshots to S3, implement multi-AZ deployment, define RTO/RPO requirements

controls.title: Account Management
controls.description: Manage user accounts and access to OpenSearch resources

implementation.description: Implement regular account reviews, disable unused accounts, use IAM roles for service access

controls.title: Transmission Confidentiality and Integrity
controls.description: Protect data in transit to and from OpenSearch

implementation.description: Enforce HTTPS/TLS 1.2+ for all client connections and inter-node communication

controls.title: Protection of Information at Rest
controls.description: Encrypt sensitive data stored in OpenSearch

implementation.description: Enable encryption at rest using customer-managed KMS keys with proper key rotation

controls.title: Content of Audit Records
controls.description: Generate comprehensive audit logs for security monitoring

implementation.description: Configure OpenSearch audit logging to capture authentication, authorization, and data access events

controls.title: Information System Backup
controls.description: Implement regular backup procedures for OpenSearch data

implementation.description: Configure automated daily snapshots with cross-region replication for disaster recovery

controls.title: Information System Monitoring
controls.description: Monitor OpenSearch for security events and anomalies

implementation.description: Implement CloudWatch monitoring with custom metrics and alerting for suspicious activities

controls.title: OpenSearch domains should have encryption at rest enabled
controls.description: Ensures OpenSearch domains encrypt data at rest to protect sensitive information

implementation.description: Set encryptionAtRestOptions.enabled to true in domain configuration with KMS key specification

controls.title: OpenSearch domains should be in a VPC
controls.description: Deploy OpenSearch domains within VPC for network isolation and security

implementation.description: Configure VPC options with private subnets and appropriate security groups in domain configuration

controls.title: OpenSearch domains should encrypt data sent between nodes
controls.description: Enable node-to-node encryption for inter-cluster communication security

implementation.description: Set nodeToNodeEncryptionOptions.enabled to true in domain configuration

controls.title: OpenSearch domain error logging to CloudWatch Logs should be enabled
controls.description: Enable error logging for troubleshooting and security monitoring

implementation.description: Configure logPublishingOptions for ERROR_LOGS with appropriate CloudWatch log group

controls.title: OpenSearch domains should have audit logging enabled
controls.description: Enable audit logging to track access and changes to OpenSearch resources

implementation.description: Configure logPublishingOptions for AUDIT_LOGS with CloudWatch log group and appropriate retention

controls.title: OpenSearch domains should have at least three data nodes
controls.description: Ensure high availability and fault tolerance with minimum three data nodes

implementation.description: Set clusterConfig.instanceCount to minimum of 3 with dedicatedMasterEnabled for production workloads

controls.title: OpenSearch domains should have encryption at rest enabled
controls.description: Detects OpenSearch domains without encryption at rest enabled

implementation.description: Enable automatic remediation through Security Hub or Config rules to enforce encryption settings

controls.title: OpenSearch domains should be in a VPC
controls.description: Identifies OpenSearch domains not deployed within a VPC

implementation.description: Ensure all OpenSearch domains are created with VPC configuration in CloudFormation/Terraform templates

controls.title: OpenSearch domains should have fine-grained access control enabled
controls.description: Ensures fine-grained access control is enabled for enhanced security

implementation.description: Enable advancedSecurityOptions with fine-grained access control and internal user database or SAML

controls.title: OpenSearch domain connections should be encrypted using TLS 1.2
controls.description: Ensures all connections use minimum TLS 1.2 for secure communication

implementation.description: Configure domainEndpointOptions with TLS security policy set to Policy-Min-TLS-1-2-2019-07 or later

controls.title: OpenSearch domains should have automatic snapshots enabled
controls.description: Verifies automatic snapshot configuration for data backup and recovery

implementation.description: Configure snapshotOptions with automated snapshot hour setting in domain configuration

controls.title: Right-size OpenSearch instances
controls.description: Monitor and optimize instance types and sizes based on actual usage patterns

implementation.description: Use CloudWatch metrics to analyze CPU, memory, and storage utilization; downsize or switch to more cost-effective instance types

controls.title: Implement data lifecycle management
controls.description: Use Index State Management policies to transition older data to cheaper storage tiers

implementation.description: Configure ISM policies to move data from hot to warm to cold storage, and delete old indices automatically

controls.title: Optimize storage configuration
controls.description: Select appropriate EBS volume types and sizes based on performance requirements

implementation.description: Use gp3 volumes instead of gp2 for better price-performance ratio, implement storage monitoring and alerting

controls.title: Use Reserved Instances for predictable workloads
controls.description: Purchase Reserved Instances for stable, long-running OpenSearch clusters

implementation.description: Analyze usage patterns and purchase 1-year or 3-year Reserved Instances for consistent workloads

controls.title: Implement cluster scaling policies
controls.description: Configure automatic scaling to match capacity with demand

implementation.description: Use Application Auto Scaling to automatically adjust cluster size based on metrics like CPU utilization or search latency

controls.title: Optimize index and shard configuration
controls.description: Configure optimal number of shards and replicas to minimize resource waste

implementation.description: Monitor shard sizes and distribution, use index templates to set appropriate shard counts for new indices

controls.title: Monitor and alert on cost anomalies
controls.description: Set up cost monitoring and alerting to detect unexpected spending increases

implementation.description: Configure AWS Cost Anomaly Detection and Budgets with notifications for OpenSearch service spending

controls.title: Use appropriate data compression
controls.description: Enable compression to reduce storage costs and improve performance

implementation.description: Configure index compression settings and use appropriate field mappings to minimize storage footprint
